There is no need for the crack.

If you're experiencing failed to register or could not connect to network, all you need to do is the following:

1. Delete this registry key:

HKCU\Software\Classes\Wow6432Node\CLSID\{1F7B5093-119B-4c50-B705-658A231CEC4B}

2. Find a valid serial, there's plenty of them.

3. Disconnect from the network and block Xilisoft via a firewall.

4. Input a serial along with anyname.

5. Turn of automatic updates.

This was a great and easy torrent! just open, install. After the install is complete close. Then open programs>xilisoft>mfc0.dll(delete file) and replace with the copy supplied. Then close all of the windows open. Start Xilisoft and put in what ever you want for the name and the serial.  And there you go!

You don't have to copy the crack file!
installation for win XP (100% working)

1. Unpack and install, don't run the program yet.
2. Open Regedit.exe.
3. go to the key HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID. (may be different in other OS)
Look for the key: {1F7B5093-119B-4c50-B705-658A231CEC4B}
Delete this key.
4. Go to firewall setting and block vc.exe and immdevice.exe
(control panel > windows firewall > Exceptions tab > Add program > find the 2 files and Add them to list. Then make sure you "UNCHECK" them in the list before exiting firewall setting.
5. With the internet turned "ON", open the the program and select "Enter License code" under Help.
6. Enter the name and code:
NAME: CREC TEAM
CODE: 1A77-F1B4-A5C5-ECA9-C8AC-B199-CC82-5F00
7. It should be successfully registered.
